events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer role and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department based on your qualifications.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps.
We conducted an initial screening phone call with you to discuss your experience and fit for the developer role.
Thank you for promptly responding and sharing additional details about your recent software projects.
Your technical interview with our senior engineering team is scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and knowledge.
We have arranged an HR interview to discuss your career goals and the company culture on May 14th.
The HR interview went well, and we appreciated your thoughtful responses and enthusiasm about joining us.
We have extended you a formal offer for the software engineer position with competitive salary and benefits.
You provided positive feedback on the offer details and expressed excitement about potentially joining our team.
Congratulations on accepting our offer! We look forward to welcoming you aboard as a key member of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun, including orientation and setup to get you up to speed swiftly.
The hiring process for the software engineer role is officially closed with your successful integration into the team.
